title: Podcast Episode 83.2 – IT TAKES TWO by Nikki Sloane
description:
Our audiobook this week is It Takes Two by USA Today Bestselling Author Nikki Sloane!

Narrated by Lia Holland

I know what’s supposed to happen at my casting call. In walks a stranger, my clothes come off, and we shoot amateur porn. Only a hot guy doesn’t show up—two of them do.

THREE SIMPLE RULES (FREE): https://amzn.to/2Uy4IrT

POOL BOY (preorder): https://amzn.to/3dQzR1f

Filthy Rich Americans: https://amzn.to/2Uxj5wx

Gift Card GIVEAWAY!: http://readmeromance.com

Follow Read Me Romance on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/readmeromance/?hl=en

Join Read Me Romance Headquarters on FB: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1681258945313004/

Find Alexa Riley on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/authoralexariley/

Find Tessa Bailey on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/tessabaileyisanauthor/

Podcast Credits
Read Me Romance Theme Song by L.B. Ballard
Podcast Production by Lola
